title: Who Has the Best Hair at IGN? - Gregway
description:
ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! What kind of question is that?!

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to a Gregway every Wednesday and Friday I take a question from the comments on this here YouTube video and or tweets you sent me at GameOverGreggy and I make a video answering them it's fun you like it so you like the video then you subscribe to the channel then you and I hang out at PAX and we go with like air guitars and it's never happened before uh today's question comes from Taylor Taylor says who has the best hair at IGN Tim gets the out of here who is the Fran Mirabella III this is IGN law there's no nobody even tries to challenge this there's not even a question like he asking who would I likes Wings the most clearly me who is the best hair at IGN Fran this has been a long running joke for as long as Fran works there which has been something like 30 years he's an old man he doesn't look it but let me tell you what old dude FR is very particular about his hair you know in the in the IGN Studio we shoot up at noon they also do the daily fix

30 years he's an old man, he doesn't look it, but let me tell you what - FR is very particular about his hair. You know, in the IGN Studio we shoot up at noon, they also do the Daily Fix; Naomi hosts Daily Fix; she bought a bunch of hair care products there. You see Fran run in there and I've seen him run in there and spray down his hair with hairspray, then he's got this whole regimen. And then one day we were out drinking and I...he...I forget how we started talking about hair, and I was talking about that I condition every day, and he flipped out; he looked at me, he's like "Greg, you only condition Tuesday and Thursday from now on." Like, all right, FR - that's kind of advice you take from him when I give you gaming advice, you take it. Fran Mirabella gives you hair advice, you take it. He's a beautiful man with a beautiful head of hair. Here's a montage of Fran Mirabella's hair. So there you have it, ladies and gentlemen - that's how this Gregway works; you ask me a

It's a beautiful man with a beautiful head of hair. Here's a montage of Fran Mirabella III's hair. So there you have it, ladies and gentlemen, that's how this Gregway works: You ask me a question, I answer in video form; we all have a good time. So make sure you leave your questions in the comments below, then talk to me on Twitter, like, subscribe - just do everything I ask you to do; it's not that hard. Until next Wednesday or Friday, have a good time, and I'll see you around the bend. I didn't say Gregway that time; I'll see you around the bend; see you around the bend, Jesus.
